data.name: 案件ＥＸ：女友的秘密 Demo
data.detailed_description:
Physical Exorcism Series

This work and the following game(s) are part of the Physical Exorcism Series. You will see some of the same characters across the series, but the stories are independent of each other and can be enjoyed separately.

THE SEQUEL TO THIS WORK

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2084180/

THE PREQUEL TO THIS WORK

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1662340/


About the Game

A horror dating sim involving a time loop. One day, you see something you shouldn't see in your girlfriend's room, making you realize she has an ulterior motive for dating you. Then by chance, you get the ability to rewind time.

Features



"I told you not to open the door to my room!"
You're invited to your girlfriend's house, but you see something you shouldn't see in her room, and then get attacked by someone...

Rewind time to avoid tragedy
After waking up, you somehow get the ability to rewind time. Using it is the only way to avoid tragedy.

Investigate items to unlock options
At the beginning, the choices you can make are limited. But by investigating items and advancing the plot, you can unlock options.

Piece together the truth with ten endings
This game has ten endings, each revealing one of your girlfriend's secrets. The only way to piece together the truth she hides is to connect those secrets.

Characters




You / Marty
A male college student. You're dating your first ever girlfriend.


Sarah "Sally" Sweet
Your girlfriend who you recently got into a relationship with. She seems to be hiding something.


Bruce "Brucie" Lyne
A member of the exorcist duo Ghosteaters. He follows his own principles.
